1.clue: I revolutionized the sport of Track and Field. Where can you find me on campus?

2.clue: Combined, we can seat 55,278 people. Find the giant ball in front of one of us.

3.clue: Stand in the right spot, and you could watch three different sports at once. You may want to race over there.

4.clue: We study the sea here, and the creatures within. But be careful. This building is more complex than our college.

5.clue: Up for a challenge? You may need to wear a harness and a helmet to take this course.

6.clue: I am several fields, nestled deep in the forest. You may even see a scrum or two.

7.clue: Want to build an app like this? Head to our center of study, and we can teach you how.

8.clue: Pick up a meal in my hall, and have a picnic on my field, which you might have seen upon entering the campus.

9.clue: In 2006 and 2007, we were back-to-back college world champs. Can you find where we play our home games?

10.clue: Built to honor students who made the ultimate sacrifice from 1914-1918, this building is now considered a central hub at OSU.

1.Description: Read a Book! Photograph the team reading a book in the library

2.Description: Instagram Pic! Take an artsy insta-pic under the Irsih Bend Covered Bridge. Post the pic on social media as well.

3.Description: Campus Brochure! Photograph a human pyramid of the team in fron of OSU's iconic Weatherford Hall.

4.Description: Obstacle Course! Complete the whole USMC obstacle training course. Get video evidence.

5.Description: Travel Abroad! Learn a non english greeting from a student at the International Living Learning Center. take a video saying the word.

6.Description: Go Greek! Find the most frequent greek letter on Greek row. Take a picture of the letter.

7.Description: Night Life! Photograph the team with an employee at Clodfelters.

8.Description: School Spirit! Photograph the team trying something on from the Beaver Store.

9.Description: Make a Friend! Video a secret handshake with a stranger.

10.Description: Stay Safe! Pick-up a free contraceptive from Student Health Services. Make sure to capture the moment.
